definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: But developers have little incentive to build less-profitable units for low-income households.
sentences.chinese: 但開發商不願爲低收入家庭建造低利潤的單元房。

sentences.english: The new policy on food price will hurt the interest of people on low incomes.
sentences.chinese: 新的食品價格政策將傷害到低收入人羣的利益。

sentences.english: In recent months, more than two dozen sub-prime lenders have closed their doors.
sentences.chinese: 近來數月，二十四家以上的低收入貸款公司關門大吉。

sentences.english: At that time, I was just a lowly paid analyst.
sentences.chinese: 那時候，我只是一個低收入的化驗員。

sentences.english: What kind of guidelines for low-income countries more appropriate?
sentences.chinese: 對於低收入國家哪種指南更合適？

sentences.english: At least 85% of UNITAID funds are spent in low income countries (LICs).
sentences.chinese: UNITAID的資金中至少85%用於低收入國家。

sentences.english: There are subsidized weatherizing services for low-income people as well.
sentences.chinese: 有政府資助的禦寒低收入的服務，以及。

sentences.english: Low-income students posted the lowest scores.
sentences.chinese: 低收入家庭的學生得分最低。

sentences.english: Brazilian football is a large part of the population of low-income black and variegated ethnic origin.
sentences.chinese: 巴西足球人口很大一局部是低收入的黑人及正色人種。

sentences.english: Most of these deaths occur in low- and middle-income countries.
sentences.chinese: 其中大多數死亡發生在低收入和中等收入國家。

sentences.english: Onion prices rose sharply pressure surge led to survival of low-income groups.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥價格的大幅上漲導致低收入羣體生存壓力驟增。

sentences.english: By the time of his death, even the once-loyal Army was starting to mutiny over low pay.
sentences.chinese: 他逝世後，曾一度忠誠的軍隊因爲低收入而譁變。

sentences.english: The students come largely from poor, Spanish-speaking families.
sentences.chinese: 這些學生多數來自說西班牙語的低收入家庭。

sentences.english: The centre is equiped with 4 haemodialysis machines to provide subsidised haemodialysis service for the needy.
sentences.chinese: 中心內現有的4架洗腎機爲低收入的病黎提供服務。

sentences.english: Arcola is a Title One school, which means it serves a large population of students from low-income families.
sentences.chinese: 阿克拉小學是一所面向社會低收入者子女的公益學校。

sentences.english: The government will pay particular attention to addressing the housing problems of low-income families.
sentences.chinese: 政府要特別關心和幫助解決低收入家庭住房問題。

definition: disadvantaged social groups (e.g. the handicapped)/the economically and politically marginalized/the dispossessed
